oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Scientists Improve Health & Welfare of Organic Laying Hens
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hinrichsen, Lena Karina
Sørensen, Jan Tind
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The mortality rate among organic laying hens is twice as high as for layers from enriched cages. In an international research collaboration scientists from Aarhus University will be investigating why this is so with the hope of improving the health and welfare of laying hens and this unsatisfactory statistic.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Hinrichsen, Lena Karina and Sørensen, Jan Tind (2012) Scientists Improve Health & Welfare of Organic Laying Hens. . Online at <http://www.thepoultrysite.com/poultrynews/25037/scientists-improve-health-welfare-of-organic-laying-hens <http://www.thepoultrysite.com/poultrynews/25037/scientists-improve-health-welfare-of-organic-laying-hens>>, accessed on: 13 August 2013.
